```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(rvest)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)
library(highcharter)
library(here)
```

```{r}
gen_8ou_0 <- "https://www.smogon.com/stats/2020-03/gen8ou-0.txt"
gen_8ou_1500 <- "https://www.smogon.com/stats/2020-03/gen8ou-1500.txt"
gen_8_ou_0_dec <- "https://www.smogon.com/stats/2019-12/gen8ou-0.txt"
```

```{r}
df_gen_8ou_0 <- usage_data_get(readLines(gen_8ou_0))
df_gen_8ou_1500 <- usage_data_get(readLines(gen_8ou_1500))
df_gen_8ou_0_dec <- usage_data_get(readLines(gen_8_ou_0_dec))
```

```{r}
df_usage_comparison <- full_join(df_gen_8ou_0, df_gen_8ou_0_dec, by = "Pokemon")
df_usage_comparison[is.na(df_usage_comparison)] <- 0
max_usage <- max(df_usage_comparison[['Usage %.x']], df_usage_comparison[['Usage %.y']])
diagonal <- data.frame(x = c(-100, 200), y = c(-100, 200))
```

```{r}
highchart() %>%
  hc_add_series(name = "diag",
                data = diagonal,
                hcaes(x = .data$x, y = .data$y),
                type = "line",
                color = "black") %>%
  hc_add_series(name = "Usage Comparison",
                data = df_usage_comparison,
                hcaes(x = .data$`Usage %.x`,y = .data$`Usage %.y`, group = .data$Pokemon),
                type = "scatter") %>% 
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_elementary()) %>%
  hc_xAxis(title = list(text = "Gen 8 OU-0 Usage %"),
           min = 0,
           max = max_usage,
           endOnTick = TRUE) %>%
  hc_yAxis(title = list(text = "Gen 8 OU-1500 Usage %"),
           min = 0,
           max = max_usage,
           endOnTick = TRUE) %>%
  hc_size(width = 600, height = 600) %>% 
  hc_plotOptions(series = list(showInLegend = FALSE))
```
